<< norm elementary functions numel >>

not

not logical, ~ operator

Syntax

C = not(A)
C = ~A

Input argument

A

a variable

Output argument

C

result of ~A

Description

C = not(A) performs not logical ~A.

Example

M = false(3, 3);
~M

See also

or, any, all.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
